request.description:
Login with username/email and password. Password is AES encrypted using SHA256(username + dynamicId) as key.

**Setup Options:**

**Option 1: Use Plain Password (Recommended)**
1. Set `plain_password` in environment variables (your actual password)
2. Set `username` in environment variables
3. The pre-request script will automatically encrypt it
4. Dynamic ID is auto-generated if not set

**Option 2: Pre-encrypt Password**
1. Use the `password-encryptor.html` tool to encrypt your password
2. Set `password` (encrypted) in environment variables
3. Set `username` in environment variables
4. Set `dynamic_id` (same one used for encryption)

**Variables:**
- `username`: Your username or email
- `plain_password`: Your plain text password (will be auto-encrypted)
- `password`: Pre-encrypted password (if not using plain_password)
- `dynamic_id`: Dynamic ID for encryption (auto-generated if not set)
- `app_id`: Application ID (default: 'web')

**Auto-save**: After successful login, the access token and user info will be automatically saved to your environment variables.

header.description: Desk token or login token (NOT Authorization Bearer)

request.description: Note: Indent API uses 'token' header instead of 'Authorization: Bearer'. Do NOT include user context headers (X-Org-Id, X-Branch-Id, etc.) as they cause 401 errors.

item.name: Orders Master Search
item.description: Uses desk token; payload matches current app request.

variable.description: Your username or email for login
Your encrypted password (AES encrypted using SHA256(username + dynamicId))
